title: Moblie Support & Inferno
description: Same day but a bit more things added :P
changes: Added a total of 10 smokes on inferno
Adjusted the colors of the map smoke markers
Changed how the origin point looks like
Compressed the images a bit more (15-35% smaller on average) which means they should load faster making the website more responsive
Sorted the Knife commands based on their subclass Number
Adjusted the General Practice Config command

title: Anubis Smoke

title: Small Adjustments

title: Initial Release
